issue.title: [Rust] Need to revert recent arrow-flight build change
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8366](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8366). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The PR  [1] merged for ARROW-7794 causes problems with projects that have a dependency on this crate where the build.rs code becomes an infinite loop looking for a parent directory named "arrow" that doesn't exist.

This PR simply reverts that change. I will need to find a better approach to resolving the original issue.

 [1] https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6858
